name: Hipqus Sample
description: Disqus monitor and notification sender to Hipchat

HIPCHAT_ROOM_ID.description: Separate multiple rooms by a dash (-)

HIPCHAT_ROOM_TOKEN.description: Separate multiple room tokens by a dash (-). Each Room Id must have a matching room token.

HIPCHAT_ROOM_MENTION.description: People you want to mention when notification arrives. Separate multiple with dash (-)
